```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(here)
library(tidyr)
library(knitr)
library(skimr)
library(tidyverse)
library(summarytools)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE)

```

# 1. Loading the dataset 
```{r}
acc_df <- read_csv(here("raw_data", "access-to-health-care_national_zaf.csv"))
```
## Dislay the first 5 rows
```{r}
kable(
  head(acc_df[-1, c("ISO3", "DataId", "Indicator", "Value", "CountryName", "SurveyYear")], 5),
  caption = "First 5 rows of the Access to Health Care Dataset (excluding first row)"
)

```

# 2. Data Overview

## Summary statistics
```{r}
summary_table <- acc_df %>%
  summarise(across(where(is.numeric),
                   list(mean = ~mean(., na.rm = TRUE),
                        sd   = ~sd(., na.rm = TRUE),
                        min  = ~min(., na.rm = TRUE),
                        max  = ~max(., na.rm = TRUE)))) %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = everything(),
    names_to = c("Variable", "Statistic"),
    names_sep = "_",
    values_to = "Value"
  ) %>%
  arrange(Variable)

# Save and display
write_csv(summary_table, "../outputs/summary tables/summary_access-to-healthcare.csv")
kable(summary_table, caption = "Summary Statistics for Numeric Variables in the Dataset")

```
# 3. Data Quality 

## Find duplicated values 
```{r}
sum(duplicated(acc_df))
```
## Inspect columns for missing/empty data as values and pecentages respectively
```{r}
colSums(is.na(acc_df))
round(colMeans(is.na(acc_df)) * 100, 2)
```

## Check for unique values
```{r}
sapply(acc_df, function(x) length(unique(x)))

```
# 4. Visualizations
## Plot: Distribution of Values by Survey Year
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

# Convert Value to numeric and remove NAs
acc_df_clean <- acc_df %>%
  mutate(Value = as.numeric(Value),
         SurveyYear = as.factor(SurveyYear)) %>%
  filter(!is.na(Value))

# Check the first few rows to make sure there is data
head(acc_df_clean)

# Plot: Distribution of Values by Survey Year
ggplot(acc_df_clean, aes(x = SurveyYear, y = Value)) +
  geom_boxplot(fill = "lightblue") +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.2, color = "darkred", alpha = 0.6) +
  labs(
    title = "Distribution of Values by Survey Year",
    x = "Survey Year",
    y = "Value"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
ggsave("../outputs/visuals/access.png", width = 6, height = 4)

```
